history.content: My case might be a bit different since I'm doing a triple in COE and L&S. The first step was to get double major application form approved. Once that was done, I had to fill out another double major application form (with my first major and third major). I included an additional degree check worksheet between my second and third majors in the application. In the end you will need signatures from all three departments. I also had to apply to one of the departments (Economics) and get in before my triple application could be approved. I would highly suggest you check with your advisors, they will be able to help you out. If you have any further questions feel free to drop them down below!

I'm a freshman about to declare a triple major in CS, Stats, and CogSci this semester. However, the major declaration form only provides a space for double major. Is there a place to apply for the triple major?
history.subject: How to fill out major declaration form for triple major?
